properties.title: Apache Directory Project: Eve Directory Server

section.name: Overview
section.p: Welcome to the Eve Directory Server Homepage!

Eve is a modular LDAP server written in pure Java. The Eve server is being completely designed from the ground up here within the incubator and will gain from the experience of building the old LDAPd server.

tr.td: Software configuration management is crittical with large systems. This section documents the layout of the source code repository.
Eve is a system made up of several components. The aspects associated with Eve's component based design are discussed here.
Describes how to build Eve from the source. Should be real simple thanks to Maven. But this should go off on how the build is structured as well for developers.
Configuring, and installing Eve with various kernels may require an entire section to be dedicated to it when the time comes.
